price: und sagen: „Preis sei unserem Herrn! Das Versprechen unseres Herrn ist wahrlich ausgeführt.
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِن كَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفۡعُولٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna sub'ḥāna rabbinā in kāna waʿdu rabbinā lamafʿūlan
